com.dxenterprise.cumulus.controller.entities

Class EntityBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dxenterprise.cumulus.controller.entities.EntityBody
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BigCloudBody, BirdBody, MediumCloudBody, SmallCloudBody

    public abstract class EntityBody
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class that represents an abstract physical body supported by a Box2D body.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected EntityBody(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, EntityModel model)
      Constructs a body representing a model in a certain world.
